name: Basilisk
author: yochaigal
description:
12 HP, 2 Armor, 15 STR, 9 DEX, 5 CHA, bite (d10), gaze (Blast)

• A giant serpent lizard that dwells in caverns and the underbrush.

• Critical damage: target's limb is turned to stone.

• Gaze: all targets nearby must save CHA or be turned to stone.

name: Alzabo
author: yochaigal
description:
• Red fur and a bear-like appearance with rows of long teeth and large, sharp claws.

• Critical damage: absorbs the voice of its victim. It mimics their speech to lure loved ones to their doom.

Taken from Gene Wolfe's Book of the New Sun.
stats: 12 HP, 12 STR, 6 DEX, 16 CHA, bite (d6), claw (d8)
